doc.field: Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello
Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello

This addendum to the Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello consists of 3 Paige boxes (3.75 linear feet) of unsorted material from the President's office pre-dating George Bugliarello's appointment as University President and includes correspondence, departmental reports, course syllabi, and professors' notes. These documents require additional processing.
Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello
